text:
I have a very simple test plan with one thread group, under that thread group I 
have lets say 100 throughput controllers.  Each throughput controller is set to 
total executions, not per user with a throughput of 1.  The thread group is set 
to 40 users, 1 second ramp-up with a loop count of 1.  What I expect to see is 
each test under the throughput being executed only once.  What I see is each 
test under every throughput controller gets executed 40 times.  It appears to 
me that the per user check box is not working as described in the manual.

Created attachment 19494
Sample test case

This is a 10 throughput controller/4 user test.  Each controller should run
only once, so total executions should be 10, not 40.
